context_card.general_topic: AI/ML research, code generation, xAI ecosystem, deep learning optimization, hackathons, and personal development
context_card.user_persona_tone: technical and enthusiastic with collaborative spirit

top_25_reranked_posts.text:

A retrieval-first approach for code generation, with a 0.6B RL-tuned reranker that beats an 8B baseline and runs ~2.5√ó faster. https://t.co/HasZe6ya62

less scrolling, more answers. https://t.co/QfAhDRU3Kg

dm if you'd like to team up (i'm unable to DM lol)

Not nitpicking, but something seems off - it‚Äôs way harder to get speedups on newer models

@djsaunde @UnslothAI Congrats!

Your Git contributions are wild. How do you keep it up and ship so steadily?

over 500 handpicked devs. only a few hours in & many great projects built already.

Super excited to see this many great builders, let's go build great things together! https://t.co/SYa62ryB9y

DM me one sentence why hackers would love to meet you/why you'd like to judge! https://t.co/gCbhpWGMDT
@freddiev4 @vboykis how different is mid-training from continued-pre-training though?

We are hiring & rapidly grow post-training at xAI! The team is at the frontier of RLHF, agents, and reasoning efficiency‚Äîin just a few months, we climbed from nothing to #2-3 @arena, #1 Search Arena & other tool use benchmarks, #1-2 in creative writing, and are Pareto-optimal on

remixed_ads.selected_ad:
Pay as you go products ‚Äî Get Autodesk Flex. Pay-as-you-go access to Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max, and more, with tokens that expire in a year. Perfect for occasional projects and quick checks. Only pay when you're designing.

#AutodeskFlex #PayAsYouGo #MakeAnything ‚Äî Autodesk's persona is that of an empowering, flexible, and essential partner for designers, engineers, and creators. They aim to be seen as:

The Enabler of Ingenuity: They provide the foundational technology (the "Design and Make Platform") that powers human ingenuity across architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and media/entertainment. Their core message is to help people "design and make anything."

Customer-Centric and Agile: They value the customer as a partner, not a product. Their campaigns emphasize an understanding of evolving business needs, offering flexible solutions like Flex to cater to occasional users, temporary staff, or those needing to try new products without a long-term commitment.

Modern and Forward-Thinking: They are constantly evolving their brand and licensing models to stay relevant and challenge conventions. Their communication is often optimistic, trusted, and human, aiming for a premium and impactful look and feel.

The Flexible Solution: Specifically with the Flex campaign, the persona is a highly adaptable provider of on-demand access, aligning costs directly with actual usage.

image_analysis.description: A clean, modern ad featuring an overhead view of a white desk workspace with a laptop displaying Autodesk software, headphones, a coffee cup, water bottle, and notebook. Bold headline 'Autodesk is putting the Flex in flexibility.' Subtext promotes pay-as-you-go access to products like Revit and AutoCAD. Includes 'Learn more' CTA button and Autodesk logo.
strengths: High-quality, premium visual style with realistic workspace evoking focus and creativity, aligning with Autodesk's modern, forward-thinking persona.
Clear hierarchy: punchy headline, concise benefits, prominent CTA button for easy scanning.
Relatable 'maker' setup (laptop, tools) subtly nods to designers/engineers without overwhelming text.
Optimistic, empowering mood through flexible messaging and clean composition.
improvement_suggestions: Tailor to tech/AI/ML audience by showing code-related workflows (e.g., laptop screen with parametric modeling, simulation scripts, or AI-assisted design in Revit/AutoCAD) to highlight optimization and ingenuity for hackathons/research projects.

Add technical specifics like 'Tokens for bursty ML prototyping or quick CAD validations‚Äîscale effortlessly without subscriptions' to resonate with occasional, high-impact use cases like the user's code gen or deep learning experiments.
Incorporate collaborative/enthusiastic elements: subtle icons for team sharing (e.g., cloud sync) or speed badges ('2.5x faster prototyping') mirroring user's interest in efficiency gains.
Enhance CTA with urgency/action: 'Start Flex Token Trial ‚Äì Build Anything Now' to match hackathon energy and xAI builder spirit.
Include subtle AI/ML tie-in visuals (e.g., generative design outputs or data viz on screen) to bridge to user's NeurIPS/hackathon world.
key_elements: Overhead workspace composition for immersive feel.
Pay-as-you-go Flex messaging and token model emphasis.
Bold headline pun and 'Learn more' CTA.
Autodesk logo and product mentions (Revit, AutoCAD).
image_analysis.style_notes: Premium, minimalist modern with optimistic, human-centered mood‚Äîclean whites, soft lighting, professional yet approachable vibe emphasizing flexibility and empowerment.

rewritten_ads.content:
Finally, checked out Autodesk Flex‚Äîpay-as-you-go tokens for Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max, and more. Tokens expire in a year, perfect for occasional projects or quick checks. Only pay when you're actually designing. Super flexible for bursty workflows! üöÄ #AutodeskFlex #PayAsYouGo

![Autodesk Flex Ad](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-67ce2d12-e1c7-40b6-a2fb-ae9a676b5533.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: Clean, modern overhead view of a tech-savvy workspace on a white desk: laptop screen showing Autodesk Revit or AutoCAD interface with a simple design model open (no exaggerated results), wireless headphones, coffee cup, water bottle, and a notebook with quick sketches or code notes. Casual, focused hacker vibe with subtle tech elements like a second monitor cable or stickers. Bold headline overlay: 'Autodesk Flex: Pay only when designing üöÄ'. Subtext: 'Tokens for Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max‚Äîexpire in a year, ideal for occasional projects.' Prominent 'Learn more' CTA button, Autodesk logo at bottom. Optimistic, collaborative mood in premium style‚Äîbright natural light, clean composition evoking quick prototyping sessions for AI/ML builders or hackathons. High-quality, realistic, no hype or fake outcomes.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: Builds on original's premium workspace and hierarchy by adding relatable tech/hacker touches (code notes, stickers) for AI/ML audience, tailors screen to show actual software use truthfully, amps enthusiastic tone with üöÄ and 'bursty workflows' nod to user's optimization interests‚Äîkeeps all key elements (overhead comp, products, CTA, logo) while feeling authentic to casual xAI/hackathon energy.

ctr_comparison.winner_reasoning: Enhanced Variant 1 excels with direct Revit/AutoCAD visuals on-screen, high relevance to ad copy's software mentions, professional workspace evoking focused design sessions; strong alignment with user's technical/enthusiastic persona via üöÄ-style dynamism and quality execution, higher emotional resonance for occasional project users in bursty workflows.

all_scores.reasoning: Enhanced Variant 1 excels with direct Revit/AutoCAD visuals on-screen, high relevance to ad copy's software mentions, professional workspace evoking focused design sessions; strong alignment with user's technical/enthusiastic persona via üöÄ-style dynamism and quality execution, higher emotional resonance for occasional project users in bursty workflows.

Original Variant 1 has solid visual appeal with a clean workspace setup and Autodesk branding that aligns with Flex messaging, but generic text overlay and less prominent software visuals reduce relevance and emotional pull for a technical AI/ML user focused on code/optimization over CAD‚Äîmoderately resonates with 'bursty workflows' but lacks excitement.

rewritten_ads.content:
Finally, rolling out Autodesk Flex!

Pay-as-you-go access to Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max, and more‚Äîwith tokens that expire in a year. Perfect for occasional projects and quick checks. Only pay when you're designing.

Less commitment, more building. üöÄ #AutodeskFlex #PayAsYouGo #MakeAnything

![Autodesk Flex Ad](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-85d69327-f319-4aff-bbd1-19143ce11ba6.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: Clean, modern overhead view of a tech-focused white desk workspace for AI/ML hackers: laptop screen prominently displaying Autodesk Revit or AutoCAD with parametric modeling or quick design validation (realistic software interface, no exaggerated results), nearby notebook with sketches, coffee cup, headphones, and water bottle. Subtle collaborative vibe with cloud sync icon in corner. Bold headline overlay: 'Autodesk Flex: Pay-as-you-go for Occasional Projects üöÄ'. Concise subtext: 'Tokens expire in a year. Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max + more. Pay only when designing.' Prominent 'Learn more' CTA button and Autodesk logo at bottom. Premium, optimistic mood with high-quality lighting, focus on efficiency and ingenuity for bursty workflows like hackathons‚Äîcrisp whites, blues, and tech accents for forward-thinking creator energy. Match social media format, realistic and truthful.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: Builds on original's premium workspace composition and clean hierarchy by tailoring laptop screen to realistic Autodesk software for tech/AI users (e.g., design validation relevant to ML prototyping/hackathons), adds enthusiastic üöÄ emoji and collaborative cloud icon to match user's voice/spirit without new claims. Preserves all key elements (overhead view, products, token model, CTA, logo) while boosting relatability for builders‚Äîmore dynamic yet truthful, no hype or inventions.

ctr_comparison.winner_reasoning: Enhanced variant directly features Revit 3D model on screen with tokens/expiry callout, coffee/plant adding casual vibe aligning perfectly with 'occasional projects/quick checks'; high visual appeal, relevance to ad copy, and resonance with tech enthusiasts into optimization‚Äîboosts CTR via specificity and üöÄ energy.

all_scores.reasoning: Enhanced variant directly features Revit 3D model on screen with tokens/expiry callout, coffee/plant adding casual vibe aligning perfectly with 'occasional projects/quick checks'; high visual appeal, relevance to ad copy, and resonance with tech enthusiasts into optimization‚Äîboosts CTR via specificity and üöÄ energy.

Original variant shows professional workspace with Autodesk branding and flex messaging, relevant to design tools but generic setup lacks strong visual punch or direct tie to pay-as-you-go flexibility; moderate appeal to technical users but lower emotional resonance and excitement for occasional projects.

rewritten_ads.content:
Pay-as-you-go for design tools ‚Äî Autodesk Flex gives you tokens for Revit, AutoCAD, 3ds Max, and more. Tokens expire in a year, perfect for occasional projects or quick checks. Only pay when you're designing.

#AutodeskFlex #PayAsYouGo #MakeAnything

Quick & flexible setup for bursty workflows üöÄ

![Autodesk Flex Ad Image](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-9cedeb58-7c6b-4c43-8aa3-ab0b314441d0.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: Overhead view of a clean, modern white desk workspace in a tech/AI lab setting, with a laptop screen showing Autodesk Revit or AutoCAD interface open for parametric modeling or quick design validation (realistic software UI, no exaggerated results), alongside a notebook with code sketches, wireless headphones, coffee cup, and water bottle. Subtle collaborative elements like a shared screen icon or cloud sync badge in the corner. Bold headline overlay: 'Autodesk Flex: Pay-as-you-go tokens for Revit, AutoCAD & more.' Subtext: 'Tokens expire in a year. Perfect for occasional projects. Only pay when designing.' Prominent 'Learn more' CTA button and Autodesk logo at bottom. Premium, optimistic mood with focused lighting, high-quality realistic style evoking ingenuity and efficiency for designers/engineers in hackathons or research‚Äîclean composition, tech-forward vibe with neutral colors (whites, blues, grays) for social media impact.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: Builds on original's premium workspace strengths and clear hierarchy by tailoring to tech/AI/ML audience: laptop shows realistic Autodesk UI for quick checks (no fake results), adds subtle code notebook and cloud sync for collaborative/hackathon spirit, incorporates efficiency vibe with 'bursty workflows' nod mirroring user's optimization interests, preserves all key elements (overhead comp, headline pun on flex, CTA, logo, product mentions) while enhancing relatability for AI researchers/builders‚Äîmore immersive and memorable without misleading claims.

ctr_comparison.winner_reasoning: Enhanced Variant 3 excels with higher quality, crisp visuals of code on laptop aligning perfectly with user's code generation and optimization interests, relevant token icons matching ad copy on pay-as-you-go for bursty workflows, strong relevance to occasional Revit/AutoCAD use in hackathons/projects, and tech-forward emotional pull.

all_scores.reasoning: Enhanced Variant 3 excels with higher quality, crisp visuals of code on laptop aligning perfectly with user's code generation and optimization interests, relevant token icons matching ad copy on pay-as-you-go for bursty workflows, strong relevance to occasional Revit/AutoCAD use in hackathons/projects, and tech-forward emotional pull.

Original Variant 3 has solid visual appeal with professional workspace setup and clear Flex branding, but busy elements and less sharp quality reduce emotional resonance for a tech-savvy AI/ML user who values clean, efficient designs over generic marketing imagery.
